description: Any day outside is a good day—and it’s made even better with the right tee to set the tone. Our Men's Active Ultralite Graphic Short Sleeve Tee is crafted with comfort in mind: with a super-soft blend of Merino wool and TENCEL™ Lyocell fibers, this performance fabric will help keep you cool, even if you’re building up that sweat. Plus, it has offset shoulder and side seams that help reduce chafing, as well as a body-skimming fit that moves with you. And if your outdoor adventure goes into the evening, it’s got reflective elements that can help you be seen. For your next day out, be sure this tee is part of your gear.
name: Smartwool Active Ultralite Graphic SS Tee - Mens

specs.value: 53% Merino Wool, 47% Lyocell. Exclusive Of Decoration
